identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a Neo-Brutalist, high-contrast invention checker that breaks gender stereotypes through bold abstraction.
identity.vibe: Modern Minimal x Pop Art. Think 'Swiss Poster meets Data Viz'.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Design precision with Pop Art vibrancy.
Emotion First: The reveal of 'Man' or 'Woman' should feel like a game show moment.
Content is King: The data (Scoreboard) is the hero.
Contrast: Stark Black/White base with aggressive Blue/Orange accents.

usage.ui_elements: font-family: 'Outfit', sans-serif; font-weight: 500; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.05em;

colors.gradients: NONE. Use solid blocks of color.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for containers.
layout.container_style: Sharp edges (rounded-none) or minimal radius (rounded-sm). Thick borders (border-2 or border-4).
layout.alignment: Asymmetrical. Do not center everything. Offset the input field or the scoreboard.

Input.style: Massive text size (text-4xl). Transparent background. Thick bottom border only (border-b-4). No focus ring, just border color change.

Button.style: Solid rectangle. rounded-none. Uppercase text. Hover: Invert colors (bg-black text-white -> bg-white text-black).

Card.style: Flat. Border-2 border-black (light mode) / border-white (dark mode). No shadow, or hard shadow (shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)]).

Scoreboard.style: Ticker tape style or massive split-screen numbers.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise overlay to the background to kill the digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.motion: Use framer-motion for the 'Reveal'. When the gender is detected, the screen should flash or the background color should shift to the accent color (Blue/Orange) for a split second.
visual_enhancers.3d_elements: Use abstract 3D shapes floating in the background (blurred) to add depth.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion react-countup clsx tailwind-merge @phosphor-icons/react`.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update `tailwind.config.js` to include the new colors (man: #002FA7, woman: #FF4500) and fonts (Syne, Outfit).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create a `Layout` component that applies the noise texture and global font styles.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the `Scoreboard` component using a split-screen design (Left: Man, Right: Woman) that updates in real-time.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Build the `SearchInput` component as a massive, central element.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Implement the 'Reveal' animation. When result comes back, animate the background color or show a massive overlay.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_7: Ensure `data-testid` is added to all interactive elements.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients. Use solid, bold colors.
Do not use rounded corners > 4px. Prefer sharp edges.
Typography must be HUGE. Don't be afraid of 10rem headings.
Animations should be snappy (0.2s - 0.3s), not floaty.
Ensure dark mode is the 'cool' mode, not just an inverted mode.
